{"list":[{"comm_msg_info":{"id":1000001492,"type":49,"datetime":1622554260,"fakeid":"3291099769","status":2,"content":""},"app_msg_ext_info":{"title":"轻音乐《向往》轻松愉悦的旋律，传递着美好的心情！","digest":"这曲《Fernweh（向往）》是德国心灵音乐大师阿恩德·斯泰恩的作品，轻松愉悦的旋律，像是在彩虹上跳跃的五彩音符，传递着美好的心情。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223498&idx=1&sn=c0827ae59a43cbd898df5deeeec58d5b&chksm=f790209cc0e7a98a449cd8e79d533da3dd123266007e600b249a9c2dbe6371dc7fbd7b2014ec&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6Q7TgicPDhHqD2F9Ueg9rDJicEc9SXsmkYtZ0vJdK9CPIXrKKbbzvjG2icyc8ACGtr2W4BsCnUda79w/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","subtype":9,"is_multi":1,"multi_app_msg_item_list":[{"title":"理查德·克莱德曼《童年的回忆》，重温美好时光","digest":"《童年的回忆》由有钢琴王子之称的法国钢琴家理查德·克莱德曼演奏，乐曲像一首诗歌，悠扬淡雅、清新抒怀，像在安静的夜晚，温柔的月光下冥想童年的欢乐情怀；

风本身是没有颜色的，风的颜色就是它经历时的颜色，它经过森林，它就是绿色，它经过天空，它就是蓝色。你要像风一般，有各种丰富的经历，要懂得尊重各种生命，崇敬自然，你才拥有这世界。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223498&idx=5&sn=2349c2d94aacc59b9caf5a8c4977b887&chksm=f790209cc0e7a98ad53b55776d99dfa1abafb34552998ab5e4cbf782590e8bc5b545c164882d&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6okibYwALSv47JIicKic1L3W1sg4sXxIS4kLO7IvsL7rnUPsiab5kmcUgdxmJHLT1vmBJLmGdsaVsfqg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"【轻音乐U盘】2000首高品质精选轻音乐合集","digest":"感谢大家支持","content":"","fileid":510739846,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223498&idx=6&sn=17c909ab80374f459050e5ded890b196&chksm=f790209cc0e7a98a20f6a5bac98bb717b87801b470bdf8556961272be7f90fc5a8b4f19acf02&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl4hvAD8aIK48icAdXErgCor5NTL3rGllJ44mTLTBvicicS2GiaCJ9Q8RjSJCwp8rsDnFd1AY1Hice0UBtg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":0,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"班得瑞《寂静之音》仿佛置身仙境","digest":"赏心悦目的何止是风景，还有佳乐。班得瑞《寂静之音》，以阿尔卑斯山的夜色为场景，将其自然静谧的林间景色，化为澄静心灵的优美乐章，伴着清洌洌的月色，带些许林风的清爽之气，宛如清水出芙蓉，天然去雕饰。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223498&idx=7&sn=f7f0100186331aa54a1cc28a77ebc112&chksm=f790209cc0e7a98a0c06e3e57eed87478a5d6ed8e9ea7c69e0e1d9d135786cd6d53ac7608c61&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl4HcXRC9cvmhhuoGibF3RB2w4qvUZdscNBPD0IkNAm8eXLb6L9iaz2pcKEnmQ2DtZY0S4TFjfp6qXCg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_re 02473435&chksm=f790207ec0e7a9680b6c4e041bf113059f9fd8e3cf3716511ade44a2c0c0e1b58becdd2ddc35&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/mp/profile_ext?action=home&__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&scene=124#wechat_redirect","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6Q7TgicPDhHqD2F9Ueg9rDJMLsjShCuriaFicvl64QQiabSpRG7iaIukDLurstzhLN5g2mDSNxT3vrGFQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":0,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"六月，愿我们：心怀美好，一路同行！","digest":"时光，从指缝间悄然滑落；日子，平平淡淡地走过。仿佛刚走进五月的浅夏，转身之间，我们却迎来了热情奔放的六月。

岁月匆匆像一阵风，带走多少欢乐和不舍？而我们依然要重复着同样的步伐，迎来日出和日落，别过月圆和月缺，挥手一月又一月，走过一年又一年。

回不去的是时光，无法重来的是人生。要走的留不住，该来的挡不住。相遇是缘，离别也是缘，相信一切都是最好的安排。唯有轻轻地道一句：五月再见，六月你好！

站在新的起点，愿我们每个人都心中有爱，眼里有光，脸上有笑；愿我们都能勇敢坚强，乐观自信，知足常乐；愿我们一路亲朋相伴，知己同行，心怀美好，去遇见最美的风景。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=3&sn=6f03efa655bc4fd356b18810591dd4fc&chksm=f790207ec0e7a9684f2a565815d865b476be70b80c9a6dd9631eee1c7fb9abad1ad429230836&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl7JEZtQ9Y4loQG9l326G8JRJ7dZBKgDa2zq8rzaPZrjEqJgJ4yYweXXFialEL2RribMrgYvEKIbvCYg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"聆听最美的旋律《让心飞翔》","digest":"与其把目光放在遥远的、不可控的未来，不如暂时放松自我，在萨克斯《让心飞翔》空灵悠扬中，让心翱翔。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=4&sn=8217df6be1ca9f45512ccb91ea484079&chksm=f790207ec0e7a968d63394836ca83b7bf3ccef2e5c1e0b0b7db044cc053238522318c1ac3298&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl5GE8K2DTMYvMVsoMPKvJnm3zSEgfh7jVPoUMhibjRThRHyc4I89hcAicTemTt2l1amfaTghClqyyQA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"唯美轻音乐《安妮之歌》清新自然，治愈心灵","digest":"今天分享的是班得瑞的《Annie's Song》（安妮之歌），选自其专辑《Wonderland》（仙境）。

钢琴和长笛联合演奏，纯净而丰富的钢琴声微微荡开，柔如冬日阳光，盈盈亮亮，温暖平静，没有一点杂音，每一个音符都像敲击在灵魂中，即便你不知道它所讲述的是什么，依然会莫名的感动。

悠扬的长笛声随之激起弥散，如一弯淙淙的溪流，婉转清脆，轻吟浅唱；又像一道故乡的原风景，没有铅华雕饰，清新自然。

聆听轻柔悦耳的旋律，感受钢琴与长笛和韵所营造的空灵意境，让人仿佛徜徉于远离凡尘的世外桃源。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=5&sn=a0ffbcde779fe5df627b79ad114b0ff8&chksm=f790207ec0e7a96813d4bacab62a6d4322685a4757573c31c67ea3fd7677ac7ce29701e22d6f&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6ialv4CIL5ytJlIeJqdUVQiaY8rEQXARYUPbXYSsgfo6lZOkGSqUlwmdhw1n7tDUpQURbOf0ONUgfg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"六一到了，祝你童心永驻，班得瑞《童年》","digest":"童年，是首快乐的歌！","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=6&sn=a7054f34bbcaf31b6946c677f9410e0f&chksm=f790207ec0e7a96864211f0bb60bc77214684c57daac064b5a303c023089b7d36466183272e4&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"https://vpic.video.qq.com/56025208/b0669271cpt.png","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"不朽名曲，大提琴演奏《摇篮曲》","digest":"","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=7&sn=358c8f5bcb6c75b228ca2ded415a892c&chksm=f790207ec0e7a968772489a4faf7e186df5ffa3ca59dd697860a989eb9c0365a5b62403a237a&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"https://vpic.video.qq.com/10918162/j0741bvhprz.png","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"舒眠
